entry.name: transfer
entry.title: Transfer Effect
entry.desc: Transfers the outline of an element to another element

longdesc.p: Very useful when trying to visualize interaction between two elements.
The transfer element iself has the class ui-effects-transfer, and needs to be styled by you, for example by adding a background or border.

argument.name: className
argument.desc: argumental class name the transfer element will receive.

argument.name: to
argument.desc: jQuery selector, the element to transfer to.

example.desc: Clicking on the green element transfers to the other.
